name: Wynn's Redemption
description:
HOW TO PLAY: Click the Yellow(#1), Orange(#2) and Red(#3) buttons to stop the crosshairs.

Click Green to shoot! Try to hit as many ghosts as you can to move on to the next level of this endless race for redemption! 

SCORE: Score is based on time remaining, the number of ghosts shot, and which ghosts you shoot. 

CREDITS: 

Music by Estudio Vaca Roxa, https://bakudas.itch.io/generic-oldwest-pack (CC0)

Character Assets were created for the jam using HippoGame's Character Editor tool.

Backgrounds were created for the jam using Flowscape.

Vocals were created for the jam using my voice. Assorted SFX were either created using generators or CC0.
